thread.section_title: The Natural Sapphire Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Natural Sapphire Company | www.thenaturalsapphirecompany.com
thread.title: JL
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by JL

author: JL
title: JL
text:
My fiance and I ordered my engagement ring online from NSC via the "Design Your Own" process, and had it shipped to Toronto, Ontario, Canada. The website shows you real (magnified) photos, including a 360 view, of the sapphire, along with lots of information. The selection of sapphires as well as ring settings (different styles, metals) was impressive. Once we found a stone and setting we liked, we requested a free CAD rendering of the sapphire with the setting. Mary from NSC then worked with us to answer our questions, and adjust our design. We ended up ordering a ring made with the same sapphire but a slightly different setting that would stack better with a wedding band, and couldn't be happier with the results!
Here's the gushing email I sent Mary after receiving my ring:
I love the ring!! The sapphire is beautiful and so blue even under dim lighting, the diamond halo is pretty and sparkly, and the yellow gold gives everything such a nice, warm glow. It's perfect.
Would definitely recommend NSC to anyone looking for a sapphire engagement ring. We had looked at some other other stores, including online retailers, but NSC offered the best stones AND price.
